project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV Files
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that allows users to perform data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for selected numerical columns.

task.name: Implement function to load CSV data
Implement function to calculate mean for given numerical columns
Implement function to calculate median for given numerical columns
Implement function to calculate mode for given numerical columns
Implement user input handling to select numerical columns
Write tests for each of the implemented functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
